feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: Simulation Videos of the Surrogate Models

link.title: Simulation Videos of the Surrogate Models

entry.content:
Here I am incluing some animations related to my Data-Driven Stochastic Closure Modeling via Conditional Diffusion Model and Neural Operator project.

Animations of the true vorticity field, and the simulation vorticity with and without G from 30s to 50s.
entry.summary: Videos for the Continuous and Stochastic Surrogate Modeling Report
